item.title:
RT by @DOOM: Smile Fest Vol. 2 Figure Announcement!
Rip and tear across generations! The iconic DOOM Marine from DOOM (1993) is ready to join the POP UP PARADE series! Stay tuned for more info!
#GSCSmileFest #goodsmile
item.dc:creator: @GoodSmile_US

description.p:
Smile Fest Vol. 2 Figure Announcement!
Rip and tear across generations! The iconic DOOM Marine from DOOM (1993) is ready to join the POP UP PARADE series! Stay tuned for more info!
#GSCSmileFest #goodsmile

item.title: RT by @DOOM: These abs turned 28 today 💪 Happy Birthday @DOOM ! 🎂 🎉

description.p: These abs turned 28 today 💪 Happy Birthday @DOOM ! 🎂 🎉

item.title: R to @DOOM: Note: Nintendo Switch users can unlock the Ranger Slayer Skin in DOOM Eternal alongside Update 6.66 sometime in early 2022. Stay tuned to the Slayers Club for updates!
item.dc:creator: @DOOM

description.p: Note: Nintendo Switch users can unlock the Ranger Slayer Skin in DOOM Eternal alongside Update 6.66 sometime in early 2022. Stay tuned to the Slayers Club for updates!

item.title: slipgate into something more comfortable by linking quake to the same http://bethesda.net account you use for eternal

item.title: R to @DOOM: also for consoles-only we added one more loss forgiveness for hot streaks so 3 total before it resets
item.dc:creator: @DOOM

description.p: also for consoles-only we added one more loss forgiveness for hot streaks so 3 total before it resets

item.title:
BATTLEMODE 2.0 🌍leaderboard reset 🆕new challenges 🆕new season rewards (pictured)
Horde Mode 🌍leaderboard reset 🆕new blitz rounds 🆕new bonus blitz 🆕new bounty demons
item.dc:creator: @DOOM

description.p:
BATTLEMODE 2.0 🌍leaderboard reset 🆕new challenges 🆕new season rewards (pictured)
Horde Mode 🌍leaderboard reset 🆕new blitz rounds 🆕new bonus blitz 🆕new bounty demons

item.title: RT by @DOOM: ⚠️ We fixed an issue with the Last Chance: Thanksgibbing Event's XP curves in @DOOM Eternal. Players who have earned enough XP to unlock rewards, we ask that you login before 12/2 and complete any new action that earns XP to receive the cosmetics they should have earned.
item.dc:creator: @BethesdaSupport

description.p: ⚠️ We fixed an issue with the Last Chance: Thanksgibbing Event's XP curves in @DOOM Eternal. Players who have earned enough XP to unlock rewards, we ask that you login before 12/2 and complete any new action that earns XP to receive the cosmetics they should have earned.
